typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Databasename as string,
		Roll_Forward_period as string,
		Group_ID as string,
		Attribute_Id as string,
		Origin_id as string,
		Version_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code = {GL Code}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code
	)) ~> StagingDB
